summary: This document is a certificate of existence and good standing for Southern Financial, LLC and Southern Trust Company, Inc. issued by Gregory R. Francis, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands. It confirms the incorporation details and compliance of these companies with local laws.

persons.name: Gregory R. Francis
persons.context: Gregory R. Francis certifies the existence and good standing of Southern Financial, LLC and Southern Trust Company, Inc. in the Virgin Islands.

keyFacts: Southern Financial, LLC was organized on February 25, 2013.
Southern Trust Company, Inc. was incorporated on November 18, 2011.
Southern Trust Company, Inc. was formerly known as Financial Informatics, Inc.
Both companies are in good standing and have paid all applicable fees.
The document is certified by the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands.
